link_desc:
This is a very simple template to monitoring APC Smart-UPS RT 8000XL.

Using this template you can monitor:
- snmp connection
- internal temperature (if the sensor is available)
- battery status
- last self-test
- when it go on battery

This template it is tested monitoring APC Smart-UPS RT 8000XL and using Zabbix 3.4 version

Federico Coppola
tags: APC 8000 XL, UPS APC RT 8000 XL, RT 8000XL, UPS APC, UPS APC RT8000
author: Federico Coppola
